title: Just bought Spellthief Lux, went from 738-ish RP (just shy of buying two 375 skins ;_;) to.. -12 RP?
body: As the title states, bought Spellthief Lux, and got charged about double the price of the discounted skin. Image is the screenshot I took showing the purchase and my negative RP amount.

replies.body:
Hey Amariithynar,

I looked into your account and verified that it charged the proper amount of RP. This seems to be a display bug. Logging out and logging back in should resolve it for you! If it's still showing -12 RP after you log, let me know!
